body:
### Welcome to the BW Character Burner Beta 
This is where the bug tracking happens. As issues are entered please provide the following:
* Platform and OS ( Mac, Wild Cougar)
* If you're issue occurs after loading a saved character file.
* Issue description.
* (Optional) your selected Lifepaths.

Update:
The Beta Burner runs only on the desktop right now. Once we'll port it down to Android, then iOS after we fix the Beta issues.
Releases will be published here on GitHub, weekly to start.

Thanks for your help.
-The Gnomes @Digital Gnomes, LLC
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
name: Bwcharacterburnerbeta
